burtis.modules.network.NetworkConfig

  • Packages that use NetworkConfig 
    Package Description
    burtis.common.events
    Common events used across modules.
    burtis.modules.gui  
    burtis.modules.gui.controller  
    burtis.modules.network
    Client-Server architecture backend.
    burtis.modules.network.server
    Classes performing Server-side network operations.
    burtis.modules.passengers
    Simulates random passenger behaviours, such as their initial appearance and destination.
    burtis.modules.simulation
    This module controls bus movements and their position.
    burtis.modules.sync
    This module controls time flow of simulation, dictating clock ticks to all other modules.

      Methods in burtis.modules.network that return NetworkConfig 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static NetworkConfig NetworkConfigFactory.CreateFromProperties(java.util.Properties properties)
      Reads and returns full configuration.
      static NetworkConfig NetworkConfig.defaultConfig()
      Builds and returns new default config used in default single-computer environment where all connections are local, and server is available on localhost address 127.0.0.1.
